thread.title: Clinton, Trump take jobs message to battleground states, in Labor Day barnstorm
thread.title_full: Clinton, Trump take jobs message to battleground states, in Labor Day barnstorm | Fox News

author: JB2535
text: It amazes me that the Union big wigs are still in the Democrat camp. NAFTA, Closing mines due to Democrats failed energy policies, The Canadian pipeline, the shipment of most American Automotive and manufacturing jobs overseas and to Mexico, The illegal immigration deluge which hurts American workers in the service industry and construction areas. Just why are they on the stage with the head of the problem?
